entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
